abstract: Replaces the elements in a menu with the elements returned by the specified handler block.

declaration.code: @MainActor func replaceChildren(ofMenu parentIdentifier: UIMenu.Identifier, from childrenBlock: ([UIMenuElement]) -> [UIMenuElement])

overview:
## Discussion

Use this method to add, remove, and rearrange the children elements of a menu. For example, the following code listing uses this method to insert a Copy HTML menu element before Paste in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenu/Identifier-swift.struct/standardEdit] menu.
title: replaceChildren(ofMenu:from:)
